description:
With this badge, you enter the draw for the 1st giveaway of the Syborgs OG Collection: The Dawn of Syborgs. 

Make sure to also follow all the directions on Twitter (follow, retweet, like, and tag your other favorite IOTA NFT) because the draw will happen there. I will then contact the winner to get their Soonaverse handle.
The actual airdrop to the winner will happen when the feature is available in the Soonaverse.

500 people can own one of these badges, but there will only be 1 winner in this draw. Even if you don't win, if I were you I'd try to collect as much XP as possible. Probably nothing.
name: 1st Syborgs OG Collection airdrop
